conversation.question: Hello, I am interested in studying at J-E-C-R-C University.
conversation.expected: Hello, welcome to J-E-C-R-C University. May I know your name?

conversation.question: My name is Rohan.
conversation.expected: Hi Rohan, what are your interests? Are you looking to pursue a particular Course?

conversation.question: I am interested in Computer Science.
conversation.expected: Great choice, Rohan. We have a good B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering Course here. Are you eligible for it? What were your marks in your qualifying exam, like Class Twelfth?

conversation.question: I scored Eighty-Eight Percent in my Class Twelfth.
conversation.expected: That's excellent, Rohan. Since you are eligible, let's talk about our campus. Where are you from?

conversation.question: I am from Jaipur.
conversation.expected: Since you are from Jaipur, you can commute to our university using our Bus facility. The Fee for the B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering Course is Two Lakh Forty-Five Thousand. Does that work for you?

conversation.question: Yes, that's fine.
conversation.expected: Thank you Rohan. I have recorded your information. Our counselors will reach out to you soon. Do you have any other questions I can help you with?

conversation.question: Hi, I am interested in taking admission in J-E-C-R-C University
conversation.expected: Hello, welcome to J-E-C-R-C University. My name is Riya, and I'll be happy to assist you. Can you please tell me your name?

conversation.question: My name is Rohan
conversation.expected: Nice to meet you, Rohan. What are your interests? Are you looking to pursue a particular Course or Field of study?

conversation.question: I am interested in Computer Science
conversation.expected: Great choice, Rohan. We have an excellent B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering Course. To confirm your Eligibility, can you please tell me about your Qualification, specifically your Class Twelfth marks?

conversation.question: I scored Eighty-Five Percent in my Class Twelfth
conversation.expected: Excellent, Rohan. With Eighty-Five Percent in Class Twelfth, you are Eligible for our B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering Course. The Fee for this Course is Two Lakh Forty-Five Thousand. Where are you from, Rohan?

conversation.question: I am from Jaipur
conversation.expected: Since you are from Jaipur, you can commute to the university easily. We also have a convenient Bus service available for students. Thank you, Rohan. I have recorded your information. Our counselors will reach out to you soon. Do you have any other questions I can help you with?
